doc:
Ernest Butcher https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernest_Butcher 0 Edward Ernest Butcher (7 April 1885 – 8 June 1965) was a British actor, on stage from 1935, and with many film and TV appearances. He was the second husband of the actress Muriel George, and stepfather to her son, the critic John Davenport.He appeared in the original production of J.B. Priestley's play When We Are Married at St. Martin's Theatre London, in 1938; and reprised his performance in the film version, in 1943. Edward_Ernest_Butcher ( 7_April_1885 – 8_June_1965 ) was a_British_actor , on stage from 1935 , and with many_film_and_TV_appearances . He was the_second_husband of the_actress_Muriel_George , and stepfather to her_son , the_critic_John_Davenport.He appeared in the_original_production of J.B._Priestley 's_play When We Are Married at St._Martin 's_Theatre_London , in 1938 ; and reprised his_performance in the_film_version , in 1943 .
